statements: SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT source_name, technology_type FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE adoption_rate > 0.5;
SELECT id, adoption_rate FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE technology_type='Solar';
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE adoption_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT source_name, region FROM RenewableEnergySources ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT source_name, technology_type FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE adoption_rate > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_sources FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE technology_type = 'Solar' AND region = 'Asia';
SELECT id, source_name, adoption_rate FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE technology_type IN ('Wind', 'Hydro') ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT AVG(adoption_rate) AS average_adoption_rate FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_type FROM renewable_energy_sources ORDER BY source_type DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM clean_energy_adoption WHERE adoption_percentage > 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, technology, adoption_percentage FROM clean_energy_adoption WHERE technology = 'Solar' AND adoption_percentage < 70;
SELECT source_name, source_type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT source_name, source_type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT source_name, source_type, capacity FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Wind' ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT region_name, technology, adoption_percentage FROM clean_energy_adoption WHERE adoption_percentage > 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC
SELECT region_name, technology, adoption_percentage FROM clean_energy_adoption WHERE technology = 'Hydro' ORDER BY adoption_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources;
SELECT id, region, source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySources ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT region, COUNT(source_name) AS total_sources FROM RenewableEnergySources GROUP BY region;
SELECT region, population, energy_consumption FROM RegionStatistics WHERE population > 1000000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegionStatistics WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT technology_name, adoption_rate FROM EnergyAdoption WHERE adoption_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE region = 'California';
SELECT region, SUM(population) AS total_population FROM RegionStatistics GROUP BY region HAVING SUM(population) > 5000000;

SELECT R.region, E.technology_name, RES.source_name FROM RegionStatistics R INNER JOIN EnergyAdoption E ON R.region = E.region INNER JOIN RenewableEnergySources RES ON R.region = RES.region ORDER BY R.region, E.technology_name, RES.source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type, region FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity_mw > 100;
SELECT source_name, capacity_mw FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_type='Solar';
SELECT * FROM adoption_tracking WHERE region_id=1;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE capacity_mw > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT source_name, capacity_mw FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' AND region = 'California'
SELECT * FROM clean_energy_technologies WHERE tech_description LIKE '%renewable%' ORDER BY tech_name DESC
SELECT tech_name, tech_description FROM clean_energy_technologies WHERE LENGTH(tech_description) > 100 ORDER BY tech_name ASC
SELECT region_name, avg_annual_energy_consumption FROM region_data WHERE avg_annual_energy_consumption < 500 ORDER BY avg_annual_energy_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources;
SELECT id, technology_name, cost FROM CleanEnergyTechnologies WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT region, year, adoption_rate FROM AdoptionStatistics WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT id, description FROM CleanEnergyTechnologies WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentIncentives WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergySources;
SELECT technology_name, efficiency, cost FROM CleanEnergyTechnologies WHERE cost < 500;
SELECT region, year, adoption_rate FROM AdoptionStatistics ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT description FROM CleanEnergyTechnologies WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE installation_date >= '2020-01-01';
